channel.title: Databases on fgaublog
channel.description: Recent content in Databases on fgaublog

item.title: adminer - alternative to phpmyadmin
item.description: more security, more performance, better interface, which promises the database management tool adminer. the single php script can handle mysql, postgresql, sqlite, ms sql, mongodb and other. i have tested the functionality, and it does what it promise. a cool tool!
